title: So if Assassins aren't supposed to oneshot squishies, what else are they supposed to do?
body:
To be able to oneshot an enemy, an assassin first has to avoid vision, get behind the squishies frontline, weather the peel and lastly fight the squishy him/herself. If an assassin managed to get directly on top of you he deserves to burst you in a matter of seconds.

Most of the people who said that assassins where "lacking counterplay" were probably just adc mains who were solo splitpushing without vision and wondering why they are permanently dying instead of hugging their {{champion:40}}.

Of all the class reworks, this is the only rework which made the class that it was targeting one of the weakest of them all. Everything that is not {{champion:107}}  or {{champion:7}}  just seems so weak to me and I think it's because of that philosophy.
